name: Real Estate Property Management System存在SQL注入漏洞
product: ["Real Estate Property Management System Real Estate Property Management System"]
description: Real Estate Property Management System是一种用于管理和维护不动产（如住宅、商业地产、写字楼等）的软件系统‌。Real Estate Property Management System存在SQL注入漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞获取数据库敏感信息。
solution:
